shots.prompt: Cinematic wide shot of a dusty attic interior during the day. Sunbeams slice through grimy windowpanes, illuminating dancing dust motes. The space is crammed with draped furniture and stacked boxes. A lone, upright piano with yellowed keys is central. The lighting is dramatic and atmospheric, highlighting the forgotten relics. High detail, volumetric lighting, cinematic composition, 8k.
